column2: 放纵：constraint；放纵：unrestrainedly；放弃：withdraw；停止做某事：put an end to
降低（地位、职位、威望或尊严）：lower
使尴尬，使羞愧：self-confidence, embarrass
减轻（程度或者强度）：reduce, degree, intensity；减少（数量），降低（价值）：reduce, amount, value
缩写，缩短：briefer
正式放弃（权力、责任）：throne
异常的，非常规的：deviating
帮助，怂恿：assist or support；鼓励：encourage
中止，搁置：inactivity
深恶痛绝，极度厌恶：extreme repugnance
永久的：enduring
无精打采的：spiritless；（地位、身份）悲惨、凄凉的：low state；卑微的，讨好的：humble
发誓放弃：rejecting, abandoning；抵制避免：resist
否认：deny, renounce；投降，放弃，交出（权力等）：surrender, relinquish
憎恶：abhor
无欺诈的，光明正大的：free from, deceit or duplicity
磨损，精神上的折磨：wear away, by friction
缩短，缩小：shorten；在不改变本意的条件下删减词语，缩写：shorten
官方的正式废除：annul；无视（某事的）存在：nonexistent
偷偷离开：depart secretly
专制的：unconstrained；无限的：unqualified；完美的，纯净不惨杂的：free from imperfection, mixture；不容置疑的，确凿的：unquestionable
使无罪，解除责任：free from, guilt, exculpate
自我克制，主动戒绝：refrain, by one's own choice
（吃喝等）有节制的，节俭的：restraint, food or alcohol, sparing
做总结，概括：abstract, summarize；使分心：away, attention
难以理解的：recondite
不合理的：unreasonable
大量的： great plenty
辱骂，抨击：condemn or vilify；不正当的或不合理使用：wrong or improper use；过分过量使用：use excessively
邻接，毗邻：adjacent
极低的，极可怜的：immeasurably low；（程度）很深的，极端的：immeasurably great
赞成：approval, consent；就任，就职：come into an office
加速：faster；使提前发生：earlier；变大，变多：greater
可以达到的：within easy reach；可以理解的：understood；能够获得的：get
辅助的，附属的：secondary, supplementary, subordinate；帮凶：one, wrongdoing
意外发生的，偶然的：unexpectedly；附带的，不重要的：not being a vital part
使适应：to change (something) so as to make it suitable
同意，赞赏：approval；赞扬：praise
提供所需（例如服务、借贷、寄宿）：provide；改变以适应新情况、新场景：make, suitable；使和谐：free of conflicts
以挑衅的形式搭讪：challenging or aggressive way
逐渐增长：grow, gradually
逐渐增长：increase gradually
（心情、心境或者语调）尖酸的：wit, cause hurt feelings
顶点，极点：highest；最佳典范：most perfect type
勉强同意；默许：accept, tacitly or passively
辛辣的，刺鼻的：harsh, taste, odor；刻薄的：wit, cause hurt feelings
刻薄的，充满仇恨的：deep-seated resentment
不同寻常的洞察力和鉴别力：exceptional discernment and judgment
敏锐的：keen discernment；严重的，急性的：immediate attention；（程度、影响）极强的：extreme
固执的，不可动摇的：unshakable, unyielding, inflexible
修改，使（适应）：modify
沉溺，上瘾：surrender, obsessively；对某事上瘾的人：habitual liking
依附，粘着：stick；服从，遵守：according to the commands；坚定地支持：steadfast support
延期，休会：suspend;
附属物，非必需部分：not essentially a part
即兴的：without previous thought or preparation
建议：give advice；责备：reprove gently
喜爱，因···感到愉悦：pleasure；宠爱：tenderness
极度谄媚：praise too much
掺杂，加入低等成分：impure, addition
部分地或有保留地揭露：disclose；预示着：give a slight indication
外来的，后天的，非内在的：not inherent or innate
敌手，对手：resists, enemy
引起注意，提到：refer
支持，提倡：support
和蔼的，温和的：ease, friendliness
喜欢，倾向：attraction
富裕的：sufficient
增加、提高（力量、财富、地位、声誉）等：enhance
加重，恶化：worse, serious, severe
集合体：units or parts, associated；集合，聚焦：collect or gather
好斗的：attack；强有力的，强烈的：forcefulness
使苦恼，使悲痛：pain, trouble, distress
煽动，激起：arouse；使不安：trouble the mind, disturb
极度感兴趣的：urgent desire or interest
（使）非常痛苦：deep sadness
无瑕疵的：no, flaw；密封的，不透气的：impermeable to air
反应迅速，乐意，欣然
不在场的证明，托辞，借口：excuse
疏远，离间：make unfriendly；转移，变卖（财产或权利）：convey or transfer
使排成一行：line；调准，校准：adjust
减轻：subdue, reduce, intensity or severity
忠诚：devotion or loyalty
缓和，减轻：relieve, lessen
间接提到：indirectly
吸引：attract or delight；诱惑做（某事）lead, pleasure or advantage
盟友，支持者：association；加入联盟：enter
在空中：in flight
孤高的，不合群的：distant
利他主义：unselfish
合并，混合：combine, unified, unite
有多种理解方式的，不确定的：more than one, doubt, uncertain
漫步，闲逛：walk slowly, leisurely, stroll
（食物）特别美味的，香的：extremely pleasing
改善，改进：become better, improve
顺从的，服从的：yield, submit
（环境、设备等的）舒适，人性化：comfort；融洽，和谐：pleasant, agreeable
好脾气，友好易相处的：friendly
友善的：friendly, amiable
友好关系，亲善和睦：friendship, friendly
